items.details: It is the first Day of school! Great Job, everyone, for your effort. Social Studies We began creating our 3-1 Class Contract with promises for the year. Each student will choose one promise to write and color for our class poster tomorrow. Language Arts Tomorrow we will have one final icebreaker activity to help us get to know each other better. To prepare, please complete the Getting to Know You paper and bring it tomorrow. Important: Complete it in private — do not show me or anyone else Don't write your name on it. Math We enjoyed some math icebreaker activities today to get our brains warmed up. We will start our math book tomorrow. Homework: None Reading On Monday, we will work on our All About Me worksheet. Please fill it out with fun facts about yourself. It will be displayed on our classroom window, so use photos, drawings, and lots of colors to make it bright and eye-catching. Science On Monday, we will continue our science fun with a Mystery Bag Game to practice thinking like scientists. For this activity, please bring a small mystery object from home (hidden in a bag or box) so your classmates can guess what it is using the science steps. Rules: Must be safe and not alive Must be small enough to carry in one hand Keep it secret until your turn
